item.title: 早盘竞价：日经指数在突破之际反弹
item.description:
A look at the day ahead in Asian markets from Alden Bentley, U.S. Breaking News Editor for Finance and Markets.翻译:美国财经与市场突发新闻编辑奥尔登·本特利 (Alden Bentley) 对亚洲市场未来一天的展望。

A question for Asia traders on Tuesday looks to be: Does the Nikkei (.N225) have the oomph to reclaim the three-decade high set Monday before profit taking kicked in, amid a reluctance to overextend before market liquidity dries up for the holidays at the end of the week.翻译:周二亚洲交易员面临的一个问题似乎是：日经指数(.N225)是否有能力在获利回吐开始之前收复周一创下的三年高点，因为在假期期间市场流动性枯竭之前不愿过度扩张。周末。

The rise of the benchmark Japanese share index to its highest intraday level since March 1990 on Monday crowned an 8% rally so far this month and the Nikkei is on track for its heftiest monthly gain in three years thanks to strong earnings and offshore demand.翻译:日本基准股指周一升至 1990 年 3 月以来的最高盘中水平，本月迄今已上涨 8%，得益于强劲的盈利和离岸需求，日经指数有望创下三年来的最大月度涨幅。

Meanwhile, the resurgent yen in U.S. trade firmed to a 6-1/2-week high against the dollar at 148.10 after last week's rally pulled dollar/yen down to its lowest since early October.翻译:与此同时，在上周的反弹将美元/日元拉至10月初以来的最低点之后，美国贸易中的日元兑美元汇率复苏，升至6-1/2周高点148.10。

Chinese blue chips .CSI300 eked out a 0.2% gain as the country's central bank held rates steady as expected, but set a firm fix for the yuan that saw the dollar slip under 7.2000 CNY=CFXS to a three-month low. It stayed soft during U.S. trading, where it last was quoted midmorning at 7.1680 yuan.翻译:由于中国央行如预期维持利率稳定，中国蓝筹股.CSI300微涨0.2%，但对人民币设定了坚定的定盘价，导致美元跌破7.2000 CNY=CFXS，跌至三个月低点。在美国交易期间，其最后报价为人民币 7.1680 元。

Asia awakens to another solid advance on Wall Street, notably tech stocks and a record high for Microsoft after CEO Satya Nadella said OpenAI chief Sam Altman is set to join the company to lead a new advanced AI research team.翻译:在首席执行官萨蒂亚·纳德拉 (Satya Nadella) 表示 OpenAI 首席执行官萨姆·奥尔特曼 (Sam Altman) 将加入该公司领导一个新的先进人工智能研究团队后，亚洲市场迎来了华尔街的又一次强劲上涨，尤其是科技股和微软创历史新高。

On Friday, the main U.S. stock indexes posted gains for the third week in a row as evidence of easing U.S. inflation supported bets that the Fed was done raising interest rates.翻译:周五，美国主要股指连续第三周上涨，因美国通胀放缓的证据支持了美联储不再加息的押注。

The benchmark S&P 500 (.SPX) is now less than 2% away from its highest level this year that was reached in July. Treasury yields ticked lower on a solid 20-year note auction and anticipation that inflation will decelerate allowing the Fed to cut interest rates next year.翻译:基准标准普尔 500 指数(.SPX)目前距离 7 月份达到的今年最高水平不到 2%。由于 20 年期国债拍卖强劲，且预期通胀将放缓，美联储明年将降息，美国国债收益率小幅走低。

There are few potential U.S. market moving events this week, besides Tuesday's day early release of the minutes from the Federal Open Market Committee's last meeting.翻译:除了周二提前发布的联邦公开市场委员会上次会议纪要外，本周美国市场几乎没有什么潜在的影响事件。

U.S. markets are closed Thursday for Thanksgiving and Friday stocks and bonds will trade abbreviated sessions. Exchanges will also be closed in Japan on Thursday.翻译:美国市场周四因感恩节休市，周五股票和债券交易时段将缩短。日本的交易所也将于周四休市。

Later in the week the Reserve Bank of Australia releases minutes of its Nov. 7 policy meeting and Bank Indonesia is expected to keep its key interest rate on hold at 6.00%. Japan releases consumer price data on Friday, arguably the data highlight for the week.翻译:本周晚些时候，澳大利亚储备银行将发布 11 月 7 日政策会议纪要，预计印度尼西亚央行将维持其关键利率在 6.00% 不变。日本周五将发布消费者价格数据，可以说是本周的数据亮点。

Here are key developments that could provide more direction to markets on Tuesday:翻译:以下是可能为周二市场提供更多方向的关键进展：

- FOMC Minutes翻译:- 联邦公开市场委员会会议纪要

- Chinese Q3 earnings: Baidu.com, iQiyi, Kingsoft Cloud, Kuaishou Technology, Tongcheng Travel Holdings翻译:- 中国第三季度财报：百度、爱奇艺、金山云、快手科技、同程旅游控股

Reporting by Alden Bentley翻译:奥尔登·本特利报道

item.title: 麦当劳将收购凯雷在中国的股份
item.description:
McDonald's (MCD.N) said on Monday it would acquire investment firm Carlyle's (CG.O) 28% stake in a partnership that manages its business in mainland China, Hong Kong and Macau, as the burger chain looks to simplify its structure in the region.翻译:麦当劳(MCD.N)周一表示，将收购投资公司凯雷(CG.O)管理其在中国大陆、香港和澳门业务的合伙企业 28% 的股份，该汉堡连锁店希望简化其在中国的结构。地区。

The deal will help McDonald's raise its holdings to 48%, while a consortium led by state-backed conglomerate CITIC Ltd (0267.HK) will maintain its controlling ownership with a 52% stake in the business.翻译:此次交易将帮助麦当劳将其持股比例提高至 48%，而由国家支持的企业集团中信股份（0267.HK）牵头的财团将保持其控股权，持有该公司 52% 的股份。

Reuters reported in April that Carlyle was discussing various options with financial advisers for its stake in McDonald's China, including setting up a continuation fund for the asset.翻译:路透社四月份报道称，凯雷正在与财务顾问讨论其持有的麦当劳中国股份的各种选择，包括为该资产设立延续基金。

There was "no better time to simplify our structure" given the benefits of China's long-term potential, McDonald's CEO Chris Kempczinski said.翻译:麦当劳首席执行官克里斯·肯普钦斯基 (Chris Kempczinski) 表示，鉴于中国的长期潜力所带来的好处，“现在正是简化我们结构的最佳时机”。

The move comes nearly six years after the burger chain agreed to sell 80% of its China and Hong Kong businesses to CITIC Ltd, its investment arm CITIC Capital and Carlyle for up to $2.1 billion.翻译:近六年前，这家汉堡连锁店同意以高达 21 亿美元的价格将 80% 的中国和香港业务出售给中信股份、其投资子公司中信资本和凯雷。

McDonald's, which currently has 5,500 stores in China, has been increasing the market share in its fastest-growing region by banking on promotions to drive demand higher in a weak consumer spending environment.翻译:麦当劳目前在中国拥有 5,500 家门店，在消费支出疲软的环境下，通过促销活动拉动需求，不断增加其增长最快地区的市场份额。

"Having a stronger investment position should give them (MCD) a better voice in making sure that the growth that they expect out of that marketplace occurs," said Northcoast Research analyst Jim Sanderson.翻译:Northcoast Research 分析师吉姆·桑德森 (Jim Sanderson) 表示：“拥有更强大的投资地位应该让他们 (MCD) 在确保实现他们期望的市场增长方面拥有更好的发言权。”

Reuters reported in August that Trustar Capital, formerly known as CITIC Capital, was also planning to raise a continuation fund that would allow the Chinese private equity firm to sell down its stake in McDonald's China.翻译:路透社8月份报道称，信星资本（原名中信资本） 还计划筹集一只延续基金，允许这家中国私募股权公司出售其在麦当劳中国的股份。

Carlyle shares were up about 1% in early trading.翻译:凯雷集团股价早盘上涨约 1%。

Reporting by Granth Vanaik in Bengaluru; Additional reporting by Deborah Sophia; Editing by Anil D'Silva, Shounak Dasgupta and Shweta Agarwal翻译:Granth Vanaik 在班加罗尔的报道；黛博拉·索菲亚的补充报道；编辑：Anil D'Silva、Shounak Dasgupta 和 Shweta Agarwal

item.title: 行业前景严峻，富士康电动汽车部门上市首日下跌
item.description:
Shares in Foxtron Vehicle Technologies (2258.TW), a unit of Taiwanese contract manufacturer Foxconn (2317.TW), fell in their market debut on Monday, hurt by concerns over headwinds in the highly competitive electric vehicle market.翻译:台湾合同制造商富士康（2317.TW）旗下子公司富士创汽车科技（2258.TW）的股价周一在首次上市时下跌，原因是对竞争激烈的电动汽车市场的不利因素的担忧。

Foxtron shares did recover some ground from earlier losses of as much as 9%, ending down 2.7% which gave it a market capitalisation of around $2.7 billion.翻译:Foxtron 股价确实从早前高达 9% 的跌幅中恢复了一些，最终下跌 2.7%，市值约为 27 亿美元。

In addition to inflation and higher interest rates which have raised the cost of buying a car, EV makers are grappling with supply-chain bottlenecks and pricing pressure.翻译:除了通货膨胀和利率上升导致购车成本上升之外，电动汽车制造商还面临着供应链瓶颈和定价压力。

"The EV market has been flooded by a red sea of price cuts by major players such as Tesla," said an analyst at Mega International Securities, who asked not to be named, citing the firm's policies on commenting publicly on listed companies.翻译:兆丰国际证券一位不愿透露姓名的分析师援引该公司公开评论上市公司的政策表示，“电动汽车市场已经被特斯拉等主要厂商的降价红海所淹没。”

"Foxtron has lost money in 2021 and 2022, and we don't think it will turn that around in the next two years."翻译:“Foxtron 在 2021 年和 2022 年都出现了亏损，我们认为未来两年内不会扭转局面。”

Foxtron is a joint venture between Foxconn - the world's largest contract manufacturer for iPhones and other consumer electronics - and local car maker Yulon (2201.TW). It currently has only one client, Luxgen, which is owned by Yulon.翻译:Foxtron 是全球最大的 iPhone 和其他消费电子产品合同制造商富士康与本地汽车制造商裕隆汽车(2201.TW)之间的合资企业。目前它只有一个客户，即裕隆集团旗下的纳智捷 (Luxgen)。

Young Liu, chairman of both Foxtron and Foxconn, said, however, the company has a clear strategy for growth.翻译:不过，富士创和富士康董事长刘扬表示，该公司有明确的增长战略。

"Foxtron will build its foundation in Taiwan, leveraging our own design and service momentum in EV, as well as Foxconn's proven business models to guide our entry into the North America, Southeast Asia mainstream markets."翻译:“富士创将在台湾打下基础，利用我们自己在电动汽车领域的设计和服务势头，以及富士康成熟的商业模式，引导我们进入北美、东南亚主流市场。”

The company raised T$7.5 billion ($235 million) in its initial public offering.翻译:该公司在首次公开募股中筹集了 75 亿新台币（2.35 亿美元）。

Separately, Liu declined to comment on what contingency plans Foxconn has should founder Terry Gou finalise his run for Taiwan's president by registering with the election commission, which he has until Friday to do so.翻译:另外，刘拒绝评论富士康如果创始人郭台铭通过向选举委员会登记最终竞选台湾总统，富士康有哪些应急计划，他必须在周五之前完成登记。

China last month announced a tax probe into Foxconn - a move which the Chinese newspaper that revealed the investigation attributed to Beijing's unhappiness with Gou's decision to run for president.翻译:中国上个月宣布对富士康展开税务调查，披露此次调查的中国报纸将此举归因于北京方面对郭台铭竞选国家主席的决定感到不满。

($1 = 31.7350 Taiwan dollars)翻译:(1 美元 = 31.7350 新台币)

Reporting by Ben Blanchard and Faith Hung in Taipei; Editing by Anne Marie Roantree, Shri Navaratnam and Edwina Gibbs翻译:Ben Blanchard 和 Faith Hung 在台北的报道；编辑：Anne Marie Roantree、Shri Navaratnam 和 Edwina Gibbs

item.title: 习近平告诉马克龙，中国希望法国企业增加投资
item.description:
China wants more French companies to invest in the country and hopes France will provide a fair business environment for Chinese firms, President Xi Jinping said on Monday, while France also called for fair rules for foreign companies in China.翻译:习近平主席周一表示，中国希望更多法国企业来华投资，希望法国为中国企业提供公平的营商环境，法国也呼吁为在华外国企业提供公平的规则。

Xi made the comments in a phone call with French President Emmanuel Macron, Chinese state television reported, seeking to strengthen ties with its European trading partner after Macron visited China in April.翻译:据中国国家电视台报道，习近平在与法国总统马克龙的电话中发表了上述言论，寻求在马克龙四月访问中国后加强与欧洲贸易伙伴的关系。

China faces an electric vehicle subsidy investigation by the European Union and a looming probe into its steelmakers. Meanwhile, several European countries have complained about China's opaque laws and rules regarding foreign companies in the country.翻译:中国面临欧盟的电动汽车补贴调查以及即将对其钢铁制造商进行的调查。与此同时，一些欧洲国家抱怨中国针对在华外国公司的不透明法律和规定。

"China is willing to maintain high-level exchanges with the French side," Xi said, adding that he welcomed more French products entering the Chinese market.翻译:中方愿同法方保持高层交往，欢迎更多法国产品进入中国市场。

Macron's office said the opening of the Chinese market should go hand-in-hand with fair competition rules for foreign companies.翻译:马克龙办公室表示，中国市场的开放应与外国企业的公平竞争规则齐头并进。

Asked whether France had made progress to counter Chinese plans to force French cosmetics companies to share manufacturing secrets with Chinese parties, a French presidential adviser said it was a major issue that Macron had raised himself.翻译:当被问及法国是否在应对中国强迫法国化妆品公司与中方分享制造机密的计划方面取得进展时，法国总统顾问表示，这是马克龙自己提出的一个重大问题。

"It's an important point for us, considering what's at stake for French companies," the adviser said.翻译:这位顾问表示：“考虑到法国公司面临的利害关系，这对我们来说很重要。”

Macron's office also said China had joined a French initiative called "Buildings Breakthrough" that sets a zero carbon emissions goal for the building sector for 2030.翻译:马克龙办公室还表示，中国已加入法国一项名为“建筑突破”的倡议，该倡议为建筑行业设定了2030年零碳排放的目标。

Xi also said China was willing to strengthen cooperation with France at the United Nations and other multilateral institutions. China took over the presidency of the U.N. Security Council (UNSC) this month.翻译:习近平还表示，中方愿同法方加强在联合国等多边机构中的合作。中国本月接任联合国安理会主席。

The leader of the world's second-largest economy also called on France to play a constructive role in promoting the positive development of China-EU relations, as ties have been strained over issues ranging from the EU's push to reduce supply chain reliance on China to the war in Ukraine.翻译:这位世界第二大经济体的领导人还呼吁法国在推动中欧关系积极发展方面发挥建设性作用，因为中欧关系因欧盟推动减少供应链对中国的依赖等问题而变得紧张。乌克兰战争。

"China and the European Union should remain partners for mutually beneficial cooperation," Xi said in the call.翻译:习近平在通话中表示，“中国和欧盟要继续做互利合作的伙伴”。

The two leaders also exchanged views on the conflict in Gaza, and agreed that it was imperative to avoid a further deterioration of the situation, in particular an even more serious humanitarian crisis, state television reported.翻译:据国家电视台报道，两位领导人还就加沙冲突交换了意见，一致认为必须避免局势进一步恶化，特别是避免更加严重的人道主义危机。

The French presidential adviser said China, as a member of the UN Security Council, should contribute more to UNRWA, the UN Palestinian refugee agency than the $1 million it currently gives every year.翻译:法国总统顾问表示，作为联合国安理会成员，中国应该向联合国巴勒斯坦难民机构近东救济工程处提供比目前每年100万美元更多的捐款。

"We encourage the Chinese authorities to do much more," the adviser said.翻译:“我们鼓励中国当局做更多的事情，”这位顾问说。

Reporting by Ethan Wang and Bernard Orr in Beijing, Michel Rose in Paris; Editing by Toby Chopra and Alex Richardson翻译:Ethan Wang 和 Bernard Orr 在北京报道，Michel Rose 在巴黎报道；托比·乔普拉和亚历克斯·理查森编辑

item.title: 美国财长耶伦称 TikTok 问题仍未解决
item.description:
The United States has concerns about issues over privacy and social media, and the matter involving TikTok is not yet resolved, U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen told CNBC in an interview on Monday.翻译:美国财政部长珍妮特·耶伦周一在接受 CNBC 采访时表示，美国对隐私和社交媒体问题感到担忧，涉及 TikTok 的问题尚未解决。

Yellen declined to discuss details involving the short video platform owned by Chinese parent company ByteDance, citing pending legal action that prevents U.S. regulators from acting.翻译:耶伦拒绝讨论涉及中国母公司字节跳动旗下短视频平台的细节，理由是悬而未决的法律行动阻止美国监管机构采取行动。

"We do have concerns around the potential issues with privacy and social media," she said, adding that she cannot discuss TikTok specifically. "This is a matter that has not yet been resolved."翻译:“我们确实对隐私和社交媒体的潜在问题感到担忧，”她说，并补充说她无法具体讨论 TikTok。 “这是一个尚未解决的问题。”

"This wasn't an explicit matter of discussion" between U.S. President Joe Biden and Chinese President Xi Jinping when they met last week, Yellen told CNBC.翻译:耶伦对 CNBC 表示，美国总统乔·拜登和中国国家主席习近平上周会面时“并没有明确讨论这件事”。

She said she discussed Chinese investments in the United States with her Chinese counterpart during their own meeting, including the process involving the Committee on Foreign Investment in the United States (CFIUS).翻译:她说，她在自己的会议上与中国同行讨论了中国在美国的投资，包括涉及美国外国投资委员会（CFIUS）的程序。

CFIUS is an interagency committee, chaired by the Department of Treasury, which reviews foreign investments in U.S. businesses and real estate that implicate national security concerns.翻译:CFIUS 是一个跨机构委员会，由财政部担任主席，负责审查涉及国家安全问题的外国对美国企业和房地产的投资。

Yellen added that both the Washington and Beijing recognize that they have the opportunity to work together after the presidents' met last week.翻译:耶伦补充说，华盛顿和北京都认识到，在上周两国元首会晤后，他们有机会合作。

Reporting by Doina Chiacu and Susan Heavey; Editing by Toby Chopra and Doina Chiacu翻译:Doina Chiacu 和 Susan Heavey 的报道；托比·乔普拉 (Toby Chopra) 和多伊纳·奇亚库 (Doina Chiacu) 编辑

item.title: 澳大利亚总理：中国海军受伤潜水员事件“危险”
item.description:
Australia's Prime Minister Anthony Albanese said a Chinese warship acted in a dangerous manner during an incident with an Australian navy vessel that injured a military diver, his first comments on the matter which he said had damaged ties.翻译:澳大利亚总理安东尼·阿尔巴内斯表示，一艘中国军舰在与一艘澳大利亚海军舰艇发生的事件中采取了危险的行为，导致一名军事潜水员受伤，这是他对此事的首次评论，他称这损害了两国关系。

HMAS Toowoomba - a long-range frigate - was conducting a diving operation in Japan's Exclusive Economic Zone on Nov. 14 to clear fishing nets from its propellers when the incident occurred, Defence Minister Richard Marles said on Saturday.翻译:日本国防部长理查德·马勒斯周六表示，11 月 14 日，英国皇家海军图文巴号远程护卫舰正在日本专属经济区进行潜水作业，以清除螺旋桨上的渔网。

Albanese, who met briefly with Chinese president Xi Jinping on the sidelines of the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) forum in San Francisco last week, has come under domestic political pressure over whether he raised the matter with the Chinese leader.翻译:阿尔巴内塞上周在旧金山举行的亚太经合组织(APEC)论坛期间与中国国家主席习近平进行了短暂会面，他因是否向中国领导人提出此事而面临国内政治压力。

In an interview on Monday with Sky News Australia, Albanese said the incident hurt one person and showed the need for "communication guardrails" between militaries.翻译:阿尔巴内斯周一在接受澳大利亚天空新闻采访时表示，这一事件造成一人受伤，并表明军队之间需要建立“通讯护栏”。

"This was dangerous, it was unsafe and unprofessional from the Chinese warship," he said.翻译:他说：“中国军舰这样做很危险、不安全、不专业。”

Albanese said the incident was raised through "all of the normal channels", but didn't disclose if it was discussed in his private meeting with Xi at APEC.翻译:阿尔巴内塞表示，这一事件是通过“所有正常渠道”提出的，但没有透露他在亚太经合组织与习近平的私人会晤中是否讨论过此事。

"The consequences of these events are that they do damage to the relationship. And this certainly is an event that does do damage. And we've made that very clear to China," he added.翻译:“这些事件的后果是它们确实损害了两国关系。这肯定是一个确实造成损害的事件。我们已经向中国明确表示了这一点，”他补充道。

A People's Liberation Army Navy destroyer closed towards HMAS Toowoomba, despite the Australian vessel notifying the Chinese warship of a diving operation, and operated its hull-mounted sonar in a manner that posed a safety risk, Marles previously said.翻译:马尔斯此前表示，尽管澳大利亚军舰通知中国军舰进行了潜水行动，一艘中国人民解放军海军驱逐舰仍接近图文巴号，并以构成安全风险的方式操作其船体声纳。

Medical assessments found minor injuries to divers likely caused by the destroyer's sonar, the defence minister added.翻译:国防部长补充说，医疗评估发现潜水员受轻伤可能是由驱逐舰的声纳造成的。

China's defence ministry responded on Monday saying that Australia's remarks were inconsistent with the facts and Beijing had lodged complaint to Canberra.翻译:中国国防部周一回应称，澳大利亚的言论与事实不符，北京已向堪培拉提出投诉。

The Chinese destroyer Ningbo monitored and identified HMAS Toowoomba, all while keeping a safe distance from it and did not carry out any activities that might affect the diving operations of the Australian side, the ministry said in a statement.翻译:中国海军“宁波”号驱逐舰对“图文巴”号舰进行了监视和识别，并与其保持安全距离，没有进行任何可能影响澳方潜水作业的活动。

"We urge the Australian side to respect the facts and stop making reckless and irresponsible accusations against China," it said.翻译:我们敦促澳方尊重事实，停止对中方进行无端、不负责任的指责。

Albanese visited China this month, the first Australian leader to do so in seven years, agreeing to restart an annual leaders' dialogue.翻译:阿尔巴内斯本月访问中国，这是七年来第一位访问中国的澳大利亚领导人，并同意重启年度领导人对话。

China's embassy in Australia referred to comments by China's foreign ministry spokesperson Mao Ning at a regular media briefing in Beijing on Monday, that China's military "is always highly disciplined and conducts professional operations in accordance with international law and international practice".翻译:中国驻澳大利亚大使馆援引中国外交部发言人毛宁周一在北京举行的例行媒体吹风会上的言论，称中国军队“纪律严明，按照国际法和国际惯例开展专业行动”。

"We hope the relevant party will stop stirring up trouble at China's doorstep and work with us to jointly sustain the momentum of the improvement and development of China-Australia relations," she added.翻译:希望有关方面停止在中方家门口兴风作浪，与我们共同努力，维护中澳关系改善发展势头。

Reporting by Kirsty Needham; Additional reporting by Bernard Orr and Ethan Wang in Beijing; Editing by Lincoln Feast, Bernadette Baum and Alex Richardson翻译:科斯蒂·李约瑟报道； Bernard Orr 和 Ethan Wang 在北京的补充报道；编辑：Lincoln Feast、Bernadette Baum 和 Alex Richardson

item.title: 小米第三季度净利润因成本节省而大幅增长，收入增加
item.description:
Smartphone maker Xiaomi Corp (1810.HK) posted a forecast-beating jump in third-quarter net income on Monday, while revenue also topped estimates as flat device shipments outperformed the wider market.翻译:智能手机制造商小米公司（1810.HK）周一公布第三季度净利润增长超预期，而由于平板设备出货量跑赢大盘，营收也超出预期。

The company's sales for the period totalled 70.9 billion yuan ($9.83 billion), beating an average estimate of 70.2 billion yuan from 13 analysts polled by LSEG.翻译:该公司当期销售额总计 709 亿元人民币（合 98.3 亿美元），超过 LSEG 调查的 13 名分析师平均预期的 702 亿元人民币。

Net income jumped by 183% from a year earlier to 6 billion yuan thanks to lower component costs and efficiencies across the business, compared to a consensus estimate of 4.6 billion yuan.翻译:由于零部件成本降低和整个业务效率提高，净利润较上年同期跃升 183% 至 60 亿元人民币，而市场普遍预期为 46 亿元人民币。

"While we did not encounter many positive external factors, the achievements we were still able to make demonstrate an improvement in our overall capabilities," Xiaomi President Lu Weibing said on an earnings call.翻译:小米总裁卢伟冰在财报电话会议上表示：“虽然我们没有遇到太多积极的外部因素，但我们仍然能够取得的成绩表明我们整体能力的提高。”

Xiaomi, China's fifth-largest smartphone brand, shipped 9.1 million devices in China during the latest quarter, according to industry research firm Canalys.翻译:根据行业研究公司 Canalys 的数据，中国第五大智能手机品牌小米最近一个季度在中国的设备出货量为 910 万部。

Though that was little changed from a year earlier, Xiaomi outperformed peers, with overall industry sales dropping 5% year on year, according to Canalys.翻译:Canalys 的数据显示，尽管与去年同期相比变化不大，但小米的表现优于同行，行业整体销售额同比下降 5%。

Demand in the world's biggest smartphone market has long been in decline, with the COVID-19 pandemic and then a weak economy persuading customers to wait longer before upgrading their phones.翻译:全球最大智能手机市场的需求长期以来一直在下降，原因是新冠肺炎 (COVID-19) 大流行以及随后的经济疲软迫使客户在升级手机之前等待更长时间。

But there have long some signs of recovery, including Xiaomi's sales of more than 1 million units of its latest flagship smartphone in the week since its launch.翻译:但长期以来已经出现了一些复苏的迹象，包括小米最新旗舰智能手机自推出以来的一周内销量超过 100 万部。

Xiaomi investors are also focused on signs of progress for its new electric vehicle division.翻译:小米投资者还关注其新电动汽车部门的进展迹象。

Last week, a unit of Beijing-based automaker BAIC Group applied to regulators for approval to manufacture two electric vehicle models under the Xiaomi brand name in a sign that production may start soon.翻译:上周，北京汽车制造商北汽集团旗下子公司向监管机构申请批准生产两款小米品牌电动汽车，这表明生产可能很快就会开始。

Xiaomi's Lu reaffirmed its goal of mass producing vehicles in the first half of 2024 during the earnings call and signalled continued investment in the vehicle business, with car-related R&D personnel reaching 3,000 by the end of September.翻译:小米集团董事长卢勇在财报电话会议上重申了2024年上半年量产汽车的目标，并表示将继续投资汽车业务，到9月底汽车相关研发人员将达到3000人。

($1 = 7.2111 Chinese yuan)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2111 人民币）

Reporting by Yelin Mo in Beijing and Brenda Goh in Shanghai; Editing by Jacqueline Wong, David Goodman and Jan Harvey翻译:莫叶琳北京报道、布兰达吴上海报道；编辑：Jacqueline Wong、David Goodman 和 Jan Harvey

item.title: 中国重申支持新国家加入金砖国家，阿根廷表示拒绝
item.description:
China reaffirmed its support on Monday for new countries joining the BRICS grouping of developing nations, even as Argentina's likely next foreign minister was quoted as saying that her country would no longer do so.翻译:中国周一重申支持新国家加入金砖国家集团，尽管阿根廷可能的下一任外交部长表示，她的国家将不再这样做。

Argentina was among six countries invited to become new members of the BRICS at a summit held in South Africa in August, part of the grouping's push to reshuffle a Western-dominated world order it sees as outdated.翻译:8月在南非举行的一次峰会上，阿根廷是受邀成为金砖国家新成员的六个国家之一，这是金砖国家推动重新洗牌其认为已经过时的西方主导世界秩序的一部分。

However, Russia's RIA news agency cited Diana Mondino, an economist tipped to become foreign minister in the administration of Argentina's newly-elected Javier Milei, as saying that her country would not now join the BRICS group.翻译:然而，俄罗斯通讯社援引经济学家戴安娜·蒙迪诺的话称，阿根廷现在不会加入金砖国家。蒙迪诺有望成为阿根廷新当选的哈维尔·米莱政府的外交部长。

Mao Ning, a Chinese foreign ministry spokesperson, told a press briefing that she was not aware of Mondino's reported comments.翻译:中国外交部发言人毛宁在新闻发布会上表示，她不了解蒙迪诺的言论报道。

"What I want to say is that the BRICS cooperation mechanism is an important platform for emerging markets and developing countries to strengthen solidarity and cooperation and uphold common interests," Mao said.翻译:毛泽东说：“我想说的是，金砖国家合作机制是新兴市场国家和发展中国家加强团结合作、维护共同利益的重要平台。”

"BRICS is also an open platform and we welcome any interested country to become a member of the BRICS family."翻译:“金砖国家也是一个开放的平台，我们欢迎任何有兴趣的国家成为金砖国家大家庭的一员。”

Milei, a right-wing libertarian who has sharply criticised China and the China-led BRICS group, was elected Argentina's new president on Sunday.翻译:曾尖锐批评中国和中国领导的金砖国家的右翼自由主义者米雷周日当选阿根廷新总统。

Milei and Mondino had both opposed Argentina joining the bloc, which also includes Brazil, Russia, India and South Africa.翻译:米莱和蒙迪诺都反对阿根廷加入该集团，该集团还包括巴西、俄罗斯、印度和南非。

"We don't understand what the benefit (of joining BRICS) is for Argentina at the moment. If it later turns out that there is a benefit, we will analyze it," she told the RIA news agency.翻译:“我们目前不明白（加入金砖国家）对阿根廷有什么好处。如果后来证明有好处，我们会分析它，”她告诉俄新社。

China and Russia are pushing for the expansion of the BRICS grouping as they seek to counter Western economic dominance.翻译:中国和俄罗斯正在推动金砖国家集团的扩张，以对抗西方的经济主导地位。

Saudi Arabia, Iran, Ethiopia, Egypt and the United Arab Emirates are the other five countries invited at the August summit to join the BRICS grouping.翻译:沙特阿拉伯、伊朗、埃塞俄比亚、埃及和阿拉伯联合酋长国是八月份峰会上受邀加入金砖国家集团的另外五个国家。

Reporting by Liz Lee and Ethan Wang Editing by Gareth Jones翻译:Liz Lee 和 Ethan Wang 报道 Gareth Jones 编辑

item.title: 尽管经济不利，汇丰仍有望实现中国财富招聘目标
item.description:
HSBC (HSBA.L) is on track to meet a target of expanding its China wealth business headcount to 3,000 by 2025, despite the country's current economic headwinds, as it bets on a steadily rising number of the extremely affluent, a senior executive said.翻译:汇丰银行(HSBA.L)一位高级管理人员表示，尽管中国目前面临经济逆风，但汇丰银行 (HSBA.L) 仍有望实现到 2025 年将其中国财富业务员工人数扩大到 3,000 人的目标，因为该行押注于极度富裕人群的数量稳步增长。

The Asia-focused bank has recruited around 1,500 wealth managers in the world's second-largest economy since 2021, Trista Sun, HSBC China head of wealth and personal banking, told Reuters.翻译:汇丰中国财富及个人银行业务主管孙翠斯塔 (Trista Sun) 告诉路透社，自 2021 年以来，这家专注于亚洲的银行已在全球第二大经济体招募了约 1,500 名理财经理。

The expansion of the China wealth advisory team serves HSBC's digital-focused "Pinnacle" strategy, part of a pivot towards Asia with $3.5 billion worth of investments committed to the region in 2021.翻译:中国财富咨询团队的扩张服务于汇丰银行以数字化为重点的“Pinnacle”战略，这是汇丰银行转向亚洲战略的一部分，汇丰银行承诺于 2021 年向该地区投资 35 亿美元。

The growing headcount is in addition to wealth advisory staff in HSBC's Chinese branches, Sun said. Most foreign banks still rely on in-branch wealth planners to serve clients in China.翻译:孙说，除了汇丰银行中国分行的财富顾问人员之外，员工人数也在不断增加。大多数外资银行仍然依赖分行内的理财规划师为中国客户提供服务。

HSBC is pressing ahead with the hiring plan as China's wealth and insurance sector is expanding faster than the country's economy is expected to, she added.翻译:她补充说，由于中国财富和保险业的扩张速度快于该国经济的预期，汇丰银行正在推进招聘计划。

The bank estimates that China's household wealth will increase by around 8.5% a year over a five-year period starting 2022, outpacing Beijing's around-5% annual target for 2023 economic growth which many fear will be a struggle to reach.翻译:该银行估计，从 2022 年开始的五年内，中国家庭财富将每年增长 8.5% 左右，超过北京设定的 2023 年经济增长 5% 左右的年度目标，许多人担心这一目标将难以实现。

Under Pinnacle, HSBC runs an insurance brokerage unit which in September became the first qualified foreign-owned broker to distribute mutual funds locally.翻译:汇丰银行在 Pinnacle 旗下运营着一个保险经纪部门，该部门于 9 月成为第一家在当地分销共同基金的合格外资经纪商。

The bank's targeted wealth clientele - adults with a net worth of at least $250,000 - is expected to double to 350 million by 2030 in China, the bank estimates.翻译:该银行估计，到 2030 年，该银行的目标财富客户（净资产至少为 25 万美元的成年人）预计将在中国翻一番，达到 3.5 亿。

A weaker Chinese yuan has bolstered demand for offshore investment options, with Sun pointing to the quota-based Qualified Domestic Institutional Investors programme (QDII) and Wealth Management Connect scheme covering China's wealthy Greater Bay Area as investors seek "exposure to the international market".翻译:人民币贬值提振了对离岸投资选择的需求，孙指出，随着投资者寻求“接触国际市场”，基于配额的合格境内机构投资者计划（QDII）和覆盖中国富裕的大湾区的理财通计划。

The London-headquartered bank has expanded its QDII offer with the acquisition of Citigroup's (C.N) China consumer wealth management business in October this year, Sun said.翻译:孙表示，这家总部位于伦敦的银行今年 10 月收购了花旗集团的中国消费者财富管理业务，扩大了 QDII 业务。

(This story has been corrected to change the year to 2021, from 2011, in paragraph 2)翻译:（这个故事已更正，将第 2 段中的年份从 2011 年更改为 2021 年）

Reporting by Xie Yu and Selena Li in Hong Kong; Editing by Sumeet Chatterjee, Kirsten Donovan翻译:谢宇、Selena Li 香港报道；编辑：Sumeet Chatterjee、克尔斯滕·多诺万

item.title: 国际货币基金组织、中国准备与阿根廷新任领导人米莱合作
item.description:
Kristalina Georgieva, head of the International Monetary Fund, and a spokesperson for China's foreign ministry said on Monday they were ready to work with Argentina's president-elect Javier Milei.翻译:国际货币基金组织总裁克里斯塔利娜·格奥尔基耶娃和中国外交部发言人周一表示，他们准备与阿根廷当选总统哈维尔·米莱合作。

Argentina elected right-wing libertarian Javier Milei as its new president on Sunday, rolling the dice on an outsider with radical views to fix an economy battered by triple-digit inflation, a looming recession and rising poverty.翻译:阿根廷周日选举右翼自由主义者哈维尔·米莱为新任总统，将赌注押在了一位持激进观点的局外人身上，以修复遭受三位数通胀、迫在眉睫的衰退和贫困加剧打击的经济。

The IMF has a $44 billion loan program with Argentina.翻译:国际货币基金组织与阿根廷有 440 亿美元的贷款计划。

"We look forward to working closely with (Milei) and his administration in the period ahead to develop and implement a strong plan to safeguard macroeconomic stability and strengthen inclusive growth for all," Georgieva said in a post on X.翻译:格奥尔基耶娃在 X 上发表的一篇文章中表示：“我们期待在未来一段时间内与（米莱）及其政府密切合作，制定和实施一项强有力的计划，以维护宏观经济稳定并加强所有人的包容性增长。”

China, another key lender to Argentina, also congratulated the South American country on its election.翻译:阿根廷的另一个主要贷款国中国也祝贺这个南美国家的当选。

"We stand ready to work with the Argentine side to continue our friendship, boost our respective development and revitalization with win-win cooperation, and promote the steady and long-term development of China-Argentina relations," foreign ministry spokesperson Mao Ning told a regular press briefing.翻译:外交部发言人毛宁表示，我们愿同阿方一道，续写友谊，以合作共赢助力各自发展振兴，推动中阿关系行稳致远。定期举行新闻发布会。

Reporting by Karin Strohecker and Liz Lee in Beijing; editing by Marc Jones and Mark Heinrich翻译:Karin Strohecker 和 Liz Lee 北京报道；马克·琼斯和马克·海因里希编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 在北京，阿拉伯和穆斯林部长敦促结束加沙战争
item.description:
Arab and Muslim ministers called on Monday for an immediate ceasefire in Gaza, as their delegation visited Beijing on the first leg of a tour to push for an end to hostilities and to allow humanitarian aid into the devastated Palestinian enclave.翻译:阿拉伯和穆斯林部长周一呼吁在加沙立即停火，他们的代表团在其访问的第一站访问北京，以推动结束敌对行动并允许人道主义援助进入遭受破坏的巴勒斯坦飞地。

The delegation, which is set to meet officials representing each of the five permanent members of the U.N. Security Council, is also piling pressure on the West to reject Israel's justification of its actions against Palestinians as self-defence.翻译:该代表团将与代表联合国安理会五个常任理事国的官员会面，并向西方施加压力，要求其拒绝接受以色列将其针对巴勒斯坦人的行动视为自卫的理由。

The officials holding meetings with China's top diplomat Wang Yi on Monday are from Saudi Arabia, Jordan, Egypt, Indonesia, Palestinian authorities and the Organisation of Islamic Cooperation, among others.翻译:周一与中国最高外交官王毅举行会晤的官员来自沙特阿拉伯、约旦、埃及、印度尼西亚、巴勒斯坦当局和伊斯兰合作组织等。

"We are here to send a clear signal: that is we must immediately stop the fighting and the killings, we must immediately deliver humanitarian supplies to Gaza," said Saudi Foreign Minister Prince Faisal bin Farhan Al Saud.翻译:沙特外交大臣费萨尔·本·法尔汉·阿勒沙特亲王表示：“我们来这里是为了发出一个明确的信号：那就是我们必须立即停止战斗和杀戮，我们必须立即向加沙运送人道主义物资。”

The extraordinary joint Islamic-Arab summit in Riyadh this month also urged the International Criminal Court to investigate "war crimes and crimes against humanity that Israel is committing" in the Palestinian territories.翻译:本月在利雅得举行的特别伊斯兰-阿拉伯联合峰会还敦促国际刑事法院调查以色列在巴勒斯坦领土上犯下的“战争罪和反人类罪”。

Saudi Arabia has sought to press the United States and Israel for an end to hostilities in Gaza, and Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman, the kingdom's de facto ruler, gathered Arab and Muslim leaders to reinforce that message.翻译:沙特阿拉伯一直试图向美国和以色列施压，要求其结束加沙的敌对行动，而该国事实上的统治者王储穆罕默德·本·萨勒曼则召集了阿拉伯和穆斯林领导人来强化这一信息。

In comments posted by his ministry on X, formerly known as Twitter, Egyptian foreign minister Sameh Shoukry told his Chinese counterpart: "We look forward to a stronger role on the part of great powers such as China in order to stop the attacks against the Palestinians in the Gaza Strip. Unfortunately, there are major countries that give cover to the current Israeli attacks."翻译:埃及外交部长萨梅赫·舒克里(Sameh Shoukry)在X（前身为推特）上发表评论时告诉中国外长：“我们期待中国等大国发挥更强有力的作用，以制止针对巴勒斯坦人的袭击“在加沙地带。不幸的是，有一些主要国家为以色列当前的袭击提供掩护。”

About 240 hostages were taken during Hamas's deadly cross-border rampage into Israel on Oct. 7, which prompted Israel to invade the Gaza Strip with the intention of eradicating the Islamist militant group.翻译:10 月 7 日，哈马斯跨境对以色列发动致命袭击，造成约 240 名人质被劫持，这促使以色列入侵加沙地带，意图消灭这个伊斯兰激进组织。

Gaza's Hamas-run government said at least 13,000 Palestinians have been killed in Israeli bombardments since then, including at least 5,500 children.翻译:加沙哈马斯政府表示，自那时以来，至少有 13,000 名巴勒斯坦人在以色列的轰炸中丧生，其中包括至少 5,500 名儿童。

Israeli ambassador to Beijing Irit Ben-Abba told foreign reporters at a briefing on Monday that she hoped there would not be "any statements from this visit about a ceasefire, now is not the time."翻译:以色列驻北京大使伊里特·本-阿巴在周一的新闻发布会上对外国记者表示，她希望“这次访问不会发表任何有关停火的声明，现在不是时候”。

She said that Israel hoped that the delegation would talk about hostages captured by Hamas "and call for their immediate release without preconditions," adding that the parties involved should talk together about Egypt's "role in facilitating humanitarian assistance."

'BROTHER AND FRIEND'

China's Wang said Beijing was a "good friend and brother of Arab and Muslim countries," adding it has "always firmly supported the just cause of the Palestinian people to restore their legitimate national rights and interests."翻译:中国王毅表示，北京是“阿拉伯和穆斯林国家的好朋友、好兄弟”，并补充说，中国“始终坚定支持巴勒斯坦人民恢复合法民族权益的正义事业”。

Since the start of hostilities, China's foreign ministry has repeatedly stopped short of condemning Hamas, instead calling for de-escalation and for Israel and Palestine to pursue a "two-state solution" for an independent Palestine.翻译:自敌对行动开始以来，中国外交部一再没有谴责哈马斯，而是呼吁缓和局势，并呼吁以色列和巴勒斯坦寻求“两国解决方案”以实现独立的巴勒斯坦。

Since the end of China's nearly three years of COVID lockdowns, Xi has launched a diplomatic push aimed at countering the United States and its allies, who he says seek to contain and suppress his country.翻译:自中国近三年的新冠封锁结束以来，习近平发起了旨在对抗美国及其盟国的外交努力，他说美国及其盟国试图遏制和镇压中国。

Beijing has deepened alliances with non-Western led multilateral groups such as the BRICS bloc of nations while strengthening ties with countries in the Middle East and the Global South.翻译:北京深化了与金砖国家集团等非西方主导的多边组织的联盟，同时加强了与中东和南方国家的关系。

On Monday, Wang added China will work to "quell the fighting in Gaza as soon as possible, alleviate the humanitarian crisis and promote an early, comprehensive, just and lasting settlement of the Palestinian issue."翻译:王毅周一表示，中国将致力于“尽快平息加沙战斗，缓解人道主义危机，推动巴勒斯坦问题早日全面、公正、持久解决”。

China's special envoy on the Middle East, Zhai Jun, has engaged officials from Israel and the Palestinian Authority - which governs in the occupied West Bank - as well as the Arab League and EU in the last year to discuss a two-state solution and recognition for Palestine at the United Nations.翻译:去年，中国中东问题特使翟隽与以色列和巴勒斯坦权力机构（在被占领的约旦河西岸治理）以及阿拉伯联盟和欧盟的官员进行了接触，讨论两国解决方案和承认问题在联合国代表巴勒斯坦。

(This story has been corrected to refer to the Palestinian representation in paragraph 3)翻译:（这个故事已被更正，以提及第 3 段中的巴勒斯坦代表）

item.title: 菲律宾呼吁邻国制定南海规则
item.description:
Summary:
  • Philippines approaches Malaysia, Vietnam on code
  • South China Sea situation has become 'more dire' -Marcos
  • Tension requires Philippines to partner with allies -Marcos
翻译:概括：
  • 菲律宾就代码与马来西亚和越南接洽
  • 马科斯：南海局势变得“更加严峻”
  • 紧张局势要求菲律宾与盟友合作——马科斯

The Philippines has approached neighbours such as Malaysia and Vietnam to discuss a separate code of conduct regarding the South China Sea, its president said on Monday, citing limited progress towards striking a broader regional pact with China.翻译:菲律宾总统周一表示，该国已与马来西亚和越南等邻国接洽，讨论制定有关南海的单独行为准则，并称在与中国达成更广泛的区域协议方面进展有限。

Relations between the two have grown more tense under President Ferdinand Marcos Jr, who has increasingly complained about China's "aggressive" behaviour while rekindling strong ties with the Philippines' sole treaty ally, the United States.翻译:在小费迪南德·马科斯总统的领导下，两国关系变得更加紧张，他越来越多地抱怨中国的“侵略”行为，同时重新点燃了与菲律宾唯一的条约盟友美国的牢固关系。

Speaking in Hawaii at a livestreamed event, Marcos said escalating tension in the South China Sea required the Philippines to partner with allies and neighbours to maintain peace in the busy waterway, with the situation now "more dire".翻译:马科斯在夏威夷的一场直播活动中发表讲话说，南海紧张局势不断升级，要求菲律宾与盟友和邻国合作，维护繁忙水道的和平，目前局势“更加严峻”。

"We are still waiting for the code of conduct between China and ASEAN and the progress has been rather slow unfortunately," Marcos said, referring to efforts by the grouping of Southeast Asian nations.翻译:马科斯在谈到东南亚国家集团的努力时表示：“我们仍在等待中国与东盟之间的行为准则，不幸的是进展相当缓慢。”

"We have taken the initiative to approach those other countries around ASEAN with whom we have existing territorial conflicts, Vietnam being one of them, Malaysia being another and to make our own code of conduct.翻译:“我们已主动与与我们存在领土冲突的东盟其他国家接触，越南是其中之一，马来西亚是另一个，并制定我们自己的行为准则。

"Hopefully this will grow further and extend to other ASEAN countries."翻译:“希望这将进一步发展并扩展到其他东盟国家。”

The embassies of China, Malaysia and Vietnam in Manila did not immediately respond to a request for comment on a possible code.翻译:中国、马来西亚和越南驻马尼拉大使馆没有立即回应对可能的代码发表评论的请求。

China said formulating a code of conduct in the South China Sea was an important task for it and ASEAN countries.翻译:中方表示，制定南海行为准则是​​中国和东盟国家的重要任务。

But a spokesperson of its foreign ministry warned at a regular press briefing, "Any move that deviates from the framework and runs counter to the spirit of the declaration on the conduct of parties (DOC) in the South China Sea is null and void."翻译:但外交部发言人在例行记者会上警告说，“任何偏离框架、违背《南海各方行为宣言》精神的举动都是无效的。”

The remarks by Marcos followed his meeting on Friday with Chinese President Xi Jinping on the sidelines of the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation forum in San Francisco.翻译:马科斯发表上述言论之前，他周五在旧金山亚太经济合作论坛期间与中国国家主席习近平会面。

The leaders discussed ways to reduce tension in the disputed strategic waters after a series of confrontations this year.翻译:在今年一系列对抗之后，两国领导人讨论了如何缓解有争议的战略水域的紧张局势。

In the past few years, ASEAN and China have worked towards creating a framework to negotiate a code of conduct, a plan dating as far back as 2002. But progress has been slow despite commitments by all parties to advance and speed the process.

ON-OFF CONFRONTATIONS

Talks on components of the code have yet to start, with concerns about how far China, which claims ownership of most of the South China Sea, is committed to a binding set of rules that ASEAN nations want to align with existing international law.翻译:关于该准则组成部分的谈判尚未开始，人们担心声称拥有南海大部分海域的中国在多大程度上致力于遵守东盟国家希望与现有国际法保持一致的一套具有约束力的规则。

China stakes its claim on its maps with the use of a "nine-dash line" that loops as far as 1,500 km (900 miles) south of its mainland, cutting into the exclusive economic zones (EEZ) of Brunei, Indonesia, Malaysia, the Philippines and Vietnam.翻译:中国使用一条“九段线”在其地图上表明自己的主权，该线一直延伸至其大陆以南1,500公里（900英里），切入文莱、印度尼西亚、马来西亚、菲律宾和越南。

Manila and Beijing have engaged in on-off confrontations for years as China has become more assertive in pressing its maritime claims, alarming neighbours and other nations operating in the key trade route, such as the United States.翻译:随着中国在海洋主张方面变得更加自信，马尼拉和北京多年来一直处于断断续续的对抗状态，这令邻国和美国等在这条重要贸易路线上活动的其他国家感到震惊。

China has turned submerged reefs into military installations equipped with radar, runways and missile systems, some inside the Philippines' EEZ.翻译:中国已将水下珊瑚礁变成了配备雷达、跑道和导弹系统的军事设施，其中一些位于菲律宾专属经济区内。

"The nearest reefs that the PLA has started to show interest in ... for building bases have come closer and closer to the Philippine coastline," said Marcos, referring to the People's Liberation Army Navy of China.翻译:马科斯在谈到中国​​人民解放军海军时说：“解放军开始对最近的珊瑚礁表现出兴趣……用于建设基地，这些珊瑚礁已经越来越靠近菲律宾海岸线。”

"The situation has become more dire than it was before."翻译:“情况比以前更加严峻了。”

In response, China's foreign ministry spokesperson said, "China's construction activities on its own territory fall entirely within China's sovereignty, and other countries have no right to make irresponsible remarks."翻译:对此，中国外交部发言人表示，“中国在自己领土上进行的建设活动完全是中国主权范围内的事情，其他国家无权说三道四”。

Marcos added that the United States "has always been behind us ... not only in terms of rhetoric, but also in terms of concrete support".翻译:马科斯补充说，美国“一直支持我们……不仅在言辞上，而且在具体支持方面”。

Additional reporting by Mikhail Flores and Liz Lee in Beijing; Editing by Martin Petty and Clarence Fernandez翻译:Mikhail Flores 和 Liz Lee 在北京的补充报道；马丁·佩蒂和克拉伦斯·费尔南德斯编辑

item.title: 中国维持贷款基准利率不变，符合预期
item.description:
China left benchmark lending rates unchanged at a monthly fixing on Monday, matching expectations, as a weaker yuan continued to limit further monetary easing and policymakers waited to see the effects of previous stimulus on credit demand.翻译:中国周一将基准贷款利率维持在月度固定利率不变，符合预期，因为人民币贬值继续限制进一步的货币宽松，政策制定者正在等待之前的刺激措施对信贷需求的影响。

Recent data shows the recovery in the world's second-largest economy remains patchy with industrial output and retail sales surprising on the upside but deflation gathering pace and few signs the struggling property market will bounce back any time soon.翻译:最近的数据显示，世界第二大经济体的复苏仍然参差不齐， 工业产出和零售销售意外上行，但通货紧缩步伐加快，几乎没有迹象表明陷入困境的房地产市场会很快反弹。

While the economy still needs more policy stimulus, an escalation of monetary easing would add unwanted downside pressure on the Chinese currency.翻译:尽管经济仍需要更多政策刺激，但货币宽松升级将给人民币带来不必要的下行压力。

The one-year loan prime rate (LPR) was kept at 3.45% and the five-year LPR was unchanged at 4.20%.翻译:一年期贷款市场报价利率（LPR）维持在3.45%，五年期贷款市场报价利率（LPR）维持在4.20%不变。

Most new and outstanding loans in China are based on the one-year LPR, while the five-year rate influences the pricing of mortgages.翻译:中国的大部分新增贷款和未偿还贷款均基于一年期LPR，而五年期利率则影响抵押贷款的定价。

In a poll of 26 market watchers conducted last week, all participants predicted no change to either the one-year or five-year LPR.翻译:上周对 26 名市场观察人士进行的一项民意调查显示，所有参与者均预测一年期或五年期 LPR 不会发生变化。

The steady fixings came after the central bank kept its medium-term interbank liquidity rate unchanged last week. The one-year LPR is loosely pegged off the medium-term lending facility (MLF) and market participants typically see changes in the MLF rate as a precursor to adjustments in the LPR.翻译:在央行上周维持中期银行间流动性利率不变后，利率稳定。一年期LPR与中期借贷便利（MLF）松散挂钩，市场参与者通常将MLF利率的变化视为LPR调整的先兆。

The PBOC injected 1.45 trillion yuan worth of one-year MLF loans into the banking system last week but kept the rates on those loans unchanged.翻译:中国人民银行上周向银行体系注入了1.45万亿元一年期MLF贷款，但维持这些贷款利率不变。

The liquidity boost resulted in a net 600 billion yuan of cash injections into the banking system, the biggest monthly increase since December 2016.翻译:流动性增加导致银行体系现金净注入6000亿元，创2016年12月以来最大单月增幅。

"Policymakers may want more time to access the impact of the recent repricing of existing mortgage contracts before they make further changes to the benchmark rate," Julian Evans-Pritchard, head of China economics at Capital Economics, said in a note released before the LPR fixing.翻译:凯投宏观(Capital Economics)中国经济主管朱利安·埃文斯-普里查德(Julian Evans-Pritchard)在LPR之前发布的一份报告中表示，“政策制定者可能需要更多时间来了解近期现有抵押贷款合同重新定价的影响，然后再进一步调整基准利率。”定影。

"The big picture though is that, with economic momentum weak and downward pressure on the renminbi reversing, we think rate reductions will come before long," he said, expecting China to lower the lending benchmark by 20 basis points at the end of the first quarter next year.翻译:他表示：“但大局是，随着经济动力疲软，人民币下行压力逆转，我们认为降息很快就会到来。”他预计中国将在第一季度末将贷款基准下调 20 个基点。明年季度。

China's yuan has clawed back some of its year-to-date losses after losing more than 6% against the dollar at one point in September.翻译:人民币兑美元汇率在 9 月份一度下跌超过 6% 后，现已收复部分年初至今的跌幅。

China remains an outlier among global central banks, having loosened monetary policy to shore up a faltering recovery but further rate cuts would widen the yield gap with the United States, risking yuan depreciation and capital outflows.翻译:中国在全球央行中仍然是一个异类，它已经放松了货币政策以支撑步履蹒跚的复苏，但进一步降息将扩大与美国的收益率差距，从而带来人民币贬值和资本外流的风险。

The LPR, which banks normally charge their best clients, is set by 18 designated commercial banks who submit proposed rates to the central bank every month.翻译:LPR 是银行通常向其最佳客户收取的费用，由 18 家指定商业银行制定，每月向央行提交建议利率。

Reporting by Winni Zhou and Tom Westbrook. Editing by Sam Holmes翻译:周温妮和汤姆·威斯布鲁克报道。山姆·霍姆斯编辑

item.title: 菲律宾寻求伙伴关系维护南海和平
item.description:
Tensions in the South China Sea require the Philippines to partner with allies and neighbours to maintain peace in the region, Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos said on Sunday.翻译:菲律宾总统费迪南德·马科斯周日表示，南海的紧张局势要求菲律宾与盟友和邻国合作，以维护该地区的和平。

Marcos was speaking at a forum in Hawaii.翻译:马科斯在夏威夷的一个论坛上发表讲话。

Reporting by Neil Jerome Morales; Editing by Muralikumar Anantharaman翻译:尼尔·杰罗姆·莫拉莱斯报道；穆拉利库马尔·阿南塔拉曼编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 菲律宾马科斯会见中国习近平寻求缓解南海紧张局势的方法
item.description:
Summary:
  • Philippines expresses concern on South China Sea tensions
  • Nobody wants to go to war -Marcos
  • China claims sovereignty over nearly the entire South China Sea
翻译:概括：
  • 菲律宾对南海紧张局势表示关切
  • 没有人愿意参战——马科斯
  • 中国宣称对几乎整个南海拥有主权

(This Nov. 18 story has been corrected to remove extraneous words in paragraph 1)翻译:（这篇 11 月 18 日的报道已被更正，删除了第 1 段中无关的文字）

Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr met with Chinese President Xi Jinping on Friday, seeking ways to reduce tensions in the South China Sea and restore Filipino fishermen's access to fishing grounds.翻译:菲律宾总统小费迪南德·马科斯周五会见了中国国家主席习近平，寻求缓解南海紧张局势并恢复菲律宾渔民进入渔场的方法。

The Philippines and China need to continue to communicate, with the meeting a key part of the process to maintain peace, and keep open sea lanes and airways over the South China Sea, Marcos told reporters on the sidelines of the APEC Summit in San Francisco翻译:APEC峰会在旧金山举行.翻译:马科斯在旧金山举行的亚太经合组织峰会期间对记者表示，菲律宾和中国需要继续沟通，这次会议是维护和平进程的关键部分，并保持南海海上航线和空中航线的开放。

"We tried to come up with mechanisms to lower the tensions in the South China Sea," Marcos said, without elaborating.翻译:马科斯表示：“我们试图制定缓解南海紧张局势的机制，”但他没有详细说明。

Marcos said he voiced concern over incidents between Chinese and Philippine vessels, including one collision. He said he also raised the plight of Filipino fishermen.翻译:马科斯表示，他对中国和菲律宾船只之间发生的事件表示担忧，其中包括一起碰撞事件。他说他还提到了菲律宾渔民的困境。

"I asked that we go back to the situation where both Chinese and Filipino fishermen were fishing together in these waters," he said.翻译:“我要求我们回到中国和菲律宾渔民在这些水域一起捕鱼的情况，”他说。

Filipino fishermen have complained that Chinese coastguard and maritime militia ships are preventing them from fishing in parts of the Philippines' 200-mile exclusive economic zone.翻译:菲律宾渔民抱怨说，中国海岸警卫队和海上民兵船只阻止他们在菲律宾200海里专属经济区的部分地区捕鱼。

Marcos said he and Xi were in agreement that geopolitical problems should not be the defining element of the two countries' relationship.翻译:马科斯表示，他和习近平一致认为，地缘政治问题不应成为两国关系的决定性因素。

Since taking office in 2022, Marcos has pursued warmer ties with the United States, a treaty ally, in contrast with the pro-Beijing stance of his predecessor.翻译:自 2022 年上任以来，马科斯一直寻求与条约盟友美国建立更温暖的关系，这与他的前任的亲北京立场形成鲜明对比。

Marcos granted the United States greater access to its military bases, including in provinces facing the South China Sea and democratically ruled Taiwan, drawing the ire of Beijing.翻译:马科斯允许美国更多地进入其军事基地，包括面向南中国海的省份和民主统治的台湾，这引起了北京的愤怒。

Tensions in the region, where China has built man-made islands with missiles and airstrips, have increased this year.翻译:今年该地区的紧张局势有所加剧，中国在该地区建造了人造岛屿、导弹和飞机跑道。

"I do not think anybody wants to go to war," Marcos said.翻译:马科斯说：“我认为没有人愿意参战。”

China claims almost the entire South China Sea, ignoring a 2016 ruling by the Permanent Court of Arbitration that invalidated Beijing's expansive claim.翻译:中国对几乎整个南海拥有主权，无视常设仲裁法院 2016 年的一项裁决，该裁决宣告北京的广泛主权主张无效。

China's embassy in Manila did not immediately respond to a request for comment.翻译:中国驻马尼拉大使馆没有立即回应置评请求。

item.title: 分析师表示，中国需要动用“多重杠杆”来扭转房地产局面
item.description:
Summary:
  • Direct govt interventions is good news, but more steps needed, analysts say
  • Lifting buyer confidence key for reviving crisis-hit property sector
  • Government support measures don't go far enough to restore demand
翻译:概括：
  • 分析师表示，政府直接干预是个好消息，但需要采取更多措施
  • 提振买家信心是重振受危机打击的房地产行业的关键
  • 政府的支持措施不足以恢复需求

China's direct interventions to ease a cash crunch for crisis-hit property developers are a step in the right direction, but analysts say these actions must be complemented by stronger fiscal and monetary policies to shore up demand in the sector.翻译:中国为缓解受危机打击的房地产开发商的现金短缺而采取的直接干预措施是朝着正确方向迈出的一步，但分析人士表示，这些行动必须辅之以更强有力的财政和货币政策，以提振该行业的需求。

The extended slump in property sales, investment, and home prices last month has piled more pressure on authorities to step up efforts to prevent contagion across the broader financial sector.翻译:上个月房地产销售、投资和房价的持续​​低迷给当局带来了更大的压力，要求当局加大力度防止疫情蔓延到更广泛的金融领域。

China's economy has struggled to get back on solid footing despite the lifting of strict COVID curbs late last year, largely because the property sector has stumbled from one crisis to another in a major blow to consumer and investor confidence.翻译:尽管去年年底取消了严格的新冠疫情限制措施，但中国经济仍难以重新站稳脚跟，这主要是因为房地产行业从一场危机转向另一场危机，对消费者和投资者信心造成重大打击。

Rescuing select developers will not be enough in itself to cushion the economic impact of the downturn, analysts say, arguing that Beijing should consider supplementing it with other steps, including boosting fiscal spending and further loosening of monetary policy.翻译:分析师表示，救助特定开发商本身并不足以缓解经济低迷带来的经济影响，北京方面应考虑采取其他措施作为补充，包括增加财政支出和进一步放松货币政策。

Beijing needs to pull "multiple levers" at the same time to address the "vulnerabilities" in the financial system, local government financing, as well as consumer sentiment, said Edward Al-Hussainy, head of emerging market fixed income research at Columbia Threadneedle, which owns Country Garden bonds.翻译:Columbia Threadneedle 新兴市场固定收益研究主管爱德华·侯赛尼 (Edward Al-Hussainy) 表示，北京需要同时拉动“多个杠杆”来解决金融体系、地方政府融资以及消费者信心方面的“脆弱性”。持有碧桂园债券。

"When confidence is low, the only entity that can solve it is the government and I think the government has to solve it by being very aggressive, very visibly aggressive, with language like 'whatever it takes'", he said.翻译:他说：“当信心低迷时，唯一能够解决问题的实体就是政府，我认为政府必须采取非常激进、非常明显的激进态度，使用‘不惜一切代价’之类的措辞来解决这个问题。”

Shoring up confidence is the biggest challenge facing Beijing and is key to getting homebuyers spending again, which analysts says isn't likely to happen soon given an uncertain economic outlook.翻译:提振信心是北京面临的最大挑战，也是让购房者再次消费的关键，但分析师表示，鉴于经济前景不确定，这不太可能很快发生。

Investors got a brief respite last week after the largest state-owned shareholder of China Vanke (000002.SZ), stepped in to back the country's No. 2 developer, with over $1.4 billion of "market tools".翻译:上周，万科(000002.SZ)最大国有股东以超过14亿美元的“市场工具”介入支持中国第二大开发商后，投资者得到了短暂的喘息机会。

Separately, Reuters reported last week that the central government was working on a plan to bail out property giant Country Garden (2007.HK), whose worsening financial woes have renewed concerns about broader contagion risk.翻译:另外，路透社上周报道称，中央政府正在制定一项救助房地产巨头碧桂园（2007.HK）的计划，该公司日益恶化的财务困境再次引发了人们对更广泛蔓延风险的担忧。

In the last few months the government's support measures for the property sector, which accounts for roughly a quarter of the Chinese economy, included easing curbs on home purchases and cutting mortgage borrowing costs.翻译:过去几个月，政府对占中国经济约四分之一的房地产行业采取了支持措施，包括放松购房限制和降低抵押贷款成本。

Beijing has so far resisted a return to the big-bang stimulus of the past that led to a massive build up in debt which it is still struggling to unwind, while it fears large scale monetary stimulus will hammer an already weakened yuan currency and intensify capital outflows.翻译:迄今为止，北京方面一直拒绝恢复过去的大规模刺激措施，这种刺激措施导致债务大量增加，目前仍在努力摆脱债务，同时担心大规模的货币刺激措施将打击本已疲软的人民币，并加剧资本流动。流出。

Still, Morgan Stanley said in a report this week that Beijing was likely to step up central government-led fiscal stimulus, focusing on urban village rebuilding, social housing construction and green capital expenditure.翻译:尽管如此，摩根士丹利本周在一份报告中表示，北京可能会加大中央政府主导的财政刺激力度，重点关注城中村重建、保障性住房建设和绿色资本支出。

China's Central Economic Work Conference next month is also expected to "signal a more flexible monetary policy", it added.

'ONE BIG HIT'

The property sector plunged into an unprecedented crisis in 2021 after a regulatory crackdown to rein in a debt-fuelled building boom tightened liquidity in the industry and sparked defaults among developers.翻译:2021 年，为遏制债务驱动的建筑热潮而进行的监管打击导致该行业流动性收紧并引发开发商违约，房地产行业陷入前所未有的危机。

Reuters reported last week that Chinese authorities have asked domestic financial behemoth Ping An Insurance Group to take a controlling stake in Country Garden. That report was denied by Ping An.翻译:路透社上周报道称，中国当局已要求国内金融巨头平安保险集团控股碧桂园。中国平安否认了这一报道。

The Chinese authorities may want to allow Country Garden's rescue by Ping An to instil confidence in the sector, said Elliot Hentov, head of macro policy research at asset manager State Street Global Advisors.翻译:资产管理公司道富环球顾问公司(State Street Global Advisors)宏观政策研究主管埃利奥特·亨托夫(Elliot Hentov)表示，中国当局可能希望平安对碧桂园进行救助，以增强对该行业的信心。

"They recognise that none of the measures... like softening mortgage conditionality, liquidity provision - have been enough to restore confidence so they might feel like they need one big hit," he said, referring to the Reuters report on the Country Garden bailout plan.翻译:他在谈到路透社关于碧桂园救助计划的报道时表示，“他们认识到，这些措施……如放宽抵押贷款条件、流动性供应等，都不足以恢复信心，因此他们可能觉得需要一次重击。”计划。

A government-led bailout of a distressed developer would be positive as it would reflect Beijing's determination to defuse the debt crisis, restructuring experts, investors and developers say, though they reckon it would require careful manoeuvring to manage the impact on the white knight.翻译:重组专家、投资者和开发商表示，政府主导的对陷入困境的开发商的救助将是积极的，因为这将反映出北京化解债务危机的决心，尽管他们认为这需要谨慎的操作来管理对白衣骑士的影响。

Regardless of the final outcome, senior executives at two mid-sized defaulted developers said the Country Garden deal would have little impact on them, as a government bailout would likely target only the systematically important firms.翻译:无论最终结果如何，两家中型违约开发商的高管表示，碧桂园交易对他们影响不大，因为政府救助可能只针对具有系统重要性的公司。

"A deal could restore some investor confidence in the capital market. But a recovery in confidence in the property market will require people buying home, not rescuing a company," said Steven Xu, president of Hong Kong-based Harmonia Capital.翻译:“这笔交易可能会恢复一些投资者对资本市场的信心。但要恢复对房地产市场的信心，需要人们买房，而不是拯救一家公司，”香港Harmonia Capital总裁史蒂文·徐(Steven Xu)表示。

"You need to fix the macro environment first; if you don't earn enough how do you buy a property?," said Xu, whose firm holds China property dollar bonds.翻译:“你需要首先解决宏观环境；如果你赚不到足够的钱，你怎么买房产？”徐说，他的公司持有中国房地产美元债券。

Bloomberg News reported on Tuesday China plans to provide at least 1 trillion yuan ($138 billion) of low-cost financing to the nation's urban village renovation and affordable housing programs.翻译:彭博新闻社周二报道称，中国计划为国家城中村改造和保障性住房项目提供至少 1 万亿元人民币（1,380 亿美元）的低成本融资。

"The move, if true, indicates regulator's increasing stance to help the sector. We think that the policy will indirectly help to provide liquidity to developers," GS-CIBM Securities head of China research Raymond Cheng.翻译:“这一举措如果属实，表明监管机构越来越愿意帮助该行业。我们认为该政策将间接帮助为开发商提供流动性，”高盛银行证券中国研究部主管郑雷蒙（Raymond Cheng）表示。

Still, additional broad-based monetary policy easing was needed to facilitate the large amount of government bond issuance and improve sentiment towards growth, Goldman Sachs said in a note, referring to the new financing report.翻译:高盛在一份报告中提到新的融资报告时表示，仍然需要进一步放松基础广泛的货币政策，以促进大量政府债券的发行并改善对增长的信心。

($1 = 7.2583 Chinese yuan renminbi)翻译:（1 美元 = 7.2583 人民币）

Reporting by Clare Jim in Hong Kong, Davide Barbuscia in New York, Karin Strohecker in London; additional reporting by Summer Zhen in Hong Kong and Rae Wee in Singapore; Editing by Sumeet Chatterjee & Shri Navaratnam翻译:Clare Jim 在香港、Davide Barbuscia 在纽约、Karin Strohecker 在伦敦报道； Summer Zen 在香港和 Rae Wee 在新加坡的补充报道；编辑：Sumeet Chatterjee 和 Shri Navaratnam

item.title: 日本军队在被中国视为易受攻击的岛屿上进行演习
item.description:
Japanese marines in amphibious assault vehicles stormed an island beach at the edge of the East China Sea on Sunday in a simulated attack to dislodge invaders from territory that Tokyo worries is vulnerable to attack from China.翻译:周日，日本海军陆战队驾驶两栖攻击车袭击了东海边缘的一个岛屿海滩，进行了一次模拟攻击，以将入侵者赶出东京担心容易受到中国攻击的领土。

As tensions run high with neighbours China, Russia and North Korea, the drill on the southwest island of Tokunoshima capped an 11-day series of exercises nationwide dubbed 05JX, meant to show the readiness of ground, sea and air forces to defend Japan's territory and infrastructure, including nuclear power plants.翻译:随着与邻国中国、俄罗斯和朝鲜的紧张局势加剧，在西南岛屿德之岛举行的演习为为期 11 天的全国范围内的系列演习画上句号，该演习被称为 05JX，旨在表明地面、海上和空中力量已做好保卫日本领土和安全的准备。基础设施，包括核电站。

"The goal of JX is to show that if there is an emergency situation resulting from an attack, that we are able respond in a joint way," General Yoshihide Yoshida, chief of staff of the Self-Defence Forces' Joint Staff, said after observing the drill on Tokunoshima.翻译:自卫队联合参谋部参谋长吉田吉秀大将表示：“JX的目标是表明，如果发生袭击造成的紧急情况，我们能够共同应对。”观察德之岛的演习。

China's defence ministry could not be reached on Sunday for comment on the Japanese drills.翻译:周日未能联系到中国国防部就日本演习发表评论。

Ground Self-Defence Force amphibious assault vehicles launched from two Maritime Self-Defense Force landing ships anchored offshore. Other troops arrived in semi-inflatable rubber boats, with heavy equipment carried to shore on military hovercraft.翻译:陆上自卫队两栖攻击车从停泊在近海的两艘海上自卫队登陆舰发射。其他部队乘坐半充气橡皮艇抵达，重型装备则用军用气垫船运到岸上。

Unlike many of the beaches along Japan's southwest island chain stretching toward Taiwan, the one on Tokunoshima does not have a coral reef that would make military operations more difficult.翻译:与日本西南岛链上向台湾延伸的许多海滩不同，德之岛上的海滩没有珊瑚礁，这会让军事行动变得更加困难。

The scope and pace of military exercises in Japan are likely to increase over the next few years, including with U.S. forces, after Prime Minister Fumio Kishida in December unveiled the country's biggest military buildup since World War Two, with a pledge to double defence spending over five years.翻译:日本首相岸田文雄去年 12 月公布了日本自第二次世界大战以来最大规模的军事建设，并承诺将国防开支翻倍，未来几年日本军事演习的范围和步伐可能会增加，其中包括与美军的演习。 5年。

Kishida has warned that East Asia could be the next Ukraine, if China, emboldened by Russia's assault on its neighbour, attacks Taiwan.翻译:岸田警告说，如果中国因俄罗斯对其邻国的攻击而胆大妄为，攻击台湾，那么东亚可能成为下一个乌克兰。

The 43.5 trillion yen ($290 billion) in planned spending will go to new weapons such as longer-range missiles as well as to increase stocks of spare parts and munitions to fight a sustained conflict.翻译:计划支出 43.5 万亿日元（2900 亿美元）将用于购买远程导弹等新武器，以及增加备件和弹药库存以应对持续冲突。

But the yen's sharp decline this year has forced Japan to cut back on some planned purchases, including new models of the U.S.-made Chinook helicopters that Japan's military used in the Tokunoshima drill.翻译:但日元今年的大幅贬值迫使日本削减了一些计划采购，包括日本军方在德之岛演习中使用的新型美制支奴干直升机。

($1 = 149.6200 yen)翻译:（1 美元 = 149.6200 日元）

Reporting by Tim Kelly, Beijing Newsroom; Editing by William Mallard翻译:北京新闻室蒂姆·凯利报道；威廉·马拉德编辑

item.title: APEC结束，台湾报道中国再次进行军事活动
item.description:
Taiwan reported renewed Chinese military activity around the island on Sunday, with nine aircraft crossing the sensitive median line of the Taiwan Strait and warships carrying out "combat readiness patrols".翻译:台湾报道称，周日中国在台湾岛周围重新展开军事活动，九架飞机越过台湾海峡敏感的中线，军舰进行“战备巡逻”。

Democratically-governed Taiwan, which China claims as its own territory, has complained for the past four years of regular Chinese military patrols and drills near the island, as Beijing seeks to pressure Taipei over its sovereignty claims.翻译:中国声称拥有民主统治的台湾是其自己的领土，过去四年来，中国在该岛附近定期进行军事巡逻和演习，对中国的定期军事巡逻和演习表示不满，因为北京试图就其主权主张向台北施压。

With Chinese President Xi Jinping in San Francisco last week for the Asia Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC) summit, where he met U.S. President Joe Biden, the scale of that military activity around Taiwan had scaled off.翻译:中国国家主席习近平上周在旧金山参加亚太经济合作组织（APEC）峰会，并会见了美国总统乔·拜登，台湾周边的军事活动规模有所缩小。

But Taiwan's defence ministry reported that starting onSunday morning it had detected nine Chinese aircraft crossing the Taiwan Strait's median line, which had previously served as an unofficial barrier between the two and which Chinese planes now regularly fly over.翻译:但台湾国防部报告称，从周日上午开始，它发现有九架中国飞机飞越台湾海峡中线，该中线以前是两国之间的非正式屏障，现在中国飞机经常飞越该中线。

The aircraft involved included Su-30 and J-10 fighters, as well as early warning and electronic warfare aircraft, the ministry said.翻译:国防部表示，涉及的飞机包括Su-30和J-10战斗机，以及预警机和电子战飞机。

The aircraft were accompanying Chinese warships carrying out "joint combat readiness patrols" it added.翻译:声明补充说，这架飞机正在伴随中国军舰进行“联合战备巡逻”。

Taiwan sent its own forces to monitor, the ministry said.翻译:国防部表示，台湾派出自己的部队进行监视。

China's defence ministry did not answer calls seeking comment. China says its activities near Taiwan are aimed at "collusion" between Taiwan separatists and the United States and to protect China's territorial integrity.翻译:中国国防部没有回复寻求置评的电话。中国表示，其在台湾附近的活动旨在“勾结”台湾分裂分子与美国，并保护中国的领土完整。

Taiwan's government, which has repeatedly offered talks with China, rejects Beijing's sovereignty claims and says only the island's people can decide their future.翻译:台湾政府多次提出与中国进行谈判，拒绝北京的主权主张，并表示只有台湾人民才能决定他们的未来。

Taiwan was a major focus of the Biden-Xi talks in San Francisco.翻译:台湾是旧金山拜登与习近平会谈的主要焦点。

Xi told Biden during their four-hour meeting on Wednesday that Taiwan was the biggest, most dangerous issue in U.S.-China ties, according to a senior U.S. official.翻译:据一位美国高级官员称，习近平在周三与拜登进行的四个小时的会面中告诉拜登， 台湾是美中关系中最大、最危险的问题。

Taiwan holds presidential and parliamentary elections on Jan. 13, with the island's fraught relations with China an important topic on the campaign trail.翻译:台湾将于 1 月 13 日举行总统和议会选举，台湾与中国的紧张关系成为竞选活动中的一个重要话题。

Over the past year and a half China has staged two large-scale war games around Taiwan, though China's air force has not flown over the island or into its territorial air space.翻译:过去一年半来，中国在台湾周围举行了两次大规模军演，但中国空军并未飞越台湾上空或进入其领空。

Reporting by Ben Blanchard; Editing by William Mallard and Kim Coghill翻译:本·布兰查德报道；威廉·马拉德和金·科希尔编辑
